review: I was addicted with alchohol, and i was facing some serious health problems,but after taking medicine now im feeling well, and now im living like sober life, definitely recommended to anyone who is facing and trying to living helthy life liquor free life.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I was having severe stomach ache on Sunday 14 th Feb 21 since 4 PM. I consulted in Emergency clinic of the hosp at 2 AM on night of 14th/15th. There was not much relief. Next day on 15th Feb pain was still continuing and I consulted Dr Prabha Ramadurai at Nano hisp at 1245 PM. She thouroughly examined my stomach area and advised for immediate Ultrasound scan as she suspected inflammation of appendix. She also advised me to consult a surgeon immediately if the appendicitis is confirmed. I underwent the scan at 4 PM and it revealed the same problem. I got admitted at 5 30 PM same day at Fortis hosp and the surgery was done on 16th. The doctor's correct diagnosis and timely advise helped me to take proper action. Thank you Dr Prabha Ramadurai.
reply_text:
Happy to know that you are doing well.
Thank you for your kind words.I am really happy I was able to help you.ðŸ‘ƒ

Doctor was very friendly. She asked all the questions regarding health issues. She will communivated in English however we are not comfortable with kannada/Tamil/Hindi.

No benefit of taking appointment from practo

Thank you doctor for the encouragement and appropriate advice to treat diabetes and digestive problems

review: *** ** *** **** ****** * **** ********* ****** **** * ***** **** ** ** **** ** ********** she is so friendly and down to earth and having absolutely no issues to explain about the management. very recently I took my mother for a routine checkup and her friendly approach to my mother made it so easy to explain . Now she is almost like a family doctor for us. I strongly recommend Dr Prabha.
Speaks Tamil which was very useful for my mother. Always friendly. But sometimes it takes time for her to recollect her patients.

review: I always visit doctor prabha for any health issues. she is polite, listenes to the issues with patience. she will not put you on unnecessary medications. she will suggest you lifestyle modifications for life time relief. thank you doctor.
she is always very busy. while consulting a patient she is worried about the patients in her other hospital..she is always in a hurry. it would be better if she concentrate on one thing at a time.
